title: Nordics and Baltics issue joint statement in support of Ukraine
summary_full: The leaders of the Baltic states and the Nordic countries, collectively known as the Nordic-Baltic 8 (NB8) gathered in Kyiv, Ukraine on February 24th in a show of support for President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy and his people. They issued the following joint statement:
